description: Detailed dashboard for DOCKERS from telegraf and InfluxDB metrics

list.definition: SELECT "host" FROM (SELECT last("uptime") AS "mean_uptime" FROM "system" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: Host
list.name: Host
list.query: SELECT "host" FROM (SELECT last("uptime") AS "mean_uptime" FROM "system" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

list.definition: SELECT "container_name" FROM (SELECT distinct("container_id") FROM "docker_container_status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "container_name")
list.label: Container
list.name: Container
list.query: SELECT "container_name" FROM (SELECT distinct("container_id") FROM "docker_container_status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "container_name")

title: Docker Dashboard
